detaileddescription.para: The AI is searching for its next target
The AI is trying to target a ship
The AI is locked onto a ship
Private enumarator for AI states. currently there are two states, the AI can be searching for a ship, or if it has found a ship it will target the same ship

detaileddescription.para: GenerateCoords will call upon the right methods to generate the appropriate shooting coordinates

parameterdescription.para: the row that will be shot at
the column that will be shot at

detaileddescription.para: ProcessShot is able to process each shot that is made and call the right methods belonging to that shot. For example, if its a miss = do nothing, if it's a hit = process that hit location

parameterdescription.para: the row that was shot at
the column that was shot at

detaileddescription.para: TargetCoords is used when a ship has been hit and it will try and destroy this ship

parameterdescription.para: row generated around the hit tile
column generated around the hit tile

detaileddescription.para: SearchCoords will randomly generate shots within the grid as long as its not hit that tile already

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: ProcessDetroy is able to process the destroyed ships targets and remove _LastHit targets. It will also call RemoveShotsAround to remove targets that it was going to shoot at

parameterdescription.para: the row that was shot at and destroyed
the row that was shot at and destroyed
the row that was shot at and destroyed

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs
location.bodyfile: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: RemoveShotsAround will remove targets that belong to the destroyed ship by checking if the source of the targets belong to the destroyed ship. If they don't put them on a new stack. Then clear the targets stack and move all the targets that still need to be shot at back onto the targets stack

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs
location.bodyfile: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: ProcessHit gets the last hit location coordinates and will ask AddTarget to create targets around that location by calling the method four times each time with a new location around the last hit location. It will then set the state of the AI and if it's not Searching or targetingShip then start ReOrderTargets.

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs
location.bodyfile: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: ReOrderTargets will optimise the targeting by re-orderin the stack that the targets are in. By putting the most important targets at the top they are the ones that will be shot at first.

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs
location.bodyfile: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: MoveToTopOfStack will re-order the stack by checkin the coordinates of each target If they have the right column or row values it will be moved to the _Match stack else put it on the _NoMatch stack. Then move all the targets from the _NoMatch stack back on the _Targets stack, these will be at the bottom making them less important. The move all the targets from the _Match stack on the _Targets stack, these will be on the top and will there for be shot at first

location.file: D:/Google Drive Accounts/Monique.n.kuhn Drive/Study/Uni Work/2020/S1/SWE20001/SWE20001 Group Project/Battleship_Project/battleship/battleships/src/Model/AIHardPlayer.cs

detaileddescription.para: AddTarget will add the targets it will shoot onto a stack

parameterdescription.para: the row of the targets location
the column of the targets location
